column4: I forget how to do this from the command line and man apt-get isn't telling me what I want, I simply want to update the computer as if I was sitting in front of it and got that downward red arrow in the upper right corner... so I went to /etc/apt/sources.list and uncomment the necessary package index files, then I ran sudo apt-get update to synch it... how can I update from here?
correct. dist-upgrade is the command to do so, if you so wish.
